## Supervision

### Individual Supervision

-   **02/2026 – 06/2026** — Supervision of a second-year undergraduate internship (Université PSL, [CPES – Sciences des données, arts et cultures](https://psl.eu/formation/cpes-psl-louis-le-grand)) as part of the [GTDID](https://umisource.github.io/GTDID/fr/) and the [PSF CREONS](https://umisource.github.io/psf_creons/) program.

-   **2025–2026** — Mentorship within the international [Ajalala (Future Earth Pathways)](https://pathways.futureearth.org/programme-ajalala/) program for young Francophone scholars in sustainability science (Africa, Canada, France).

-   **04/2024 – 06/2024** — Co-supervision of a Master’s 1 research internship within the [GTDID](https://www.umi-source.uvsq.fr/gt-disparites-et-inegalites-doctorales).

### Collective Supervision

-   **2022–2025** — Supervision of tutored projects for the\
    [EEDS Master’s program](https://www.universite-paris-saclay.fr/formation/master/economie-politique-et-institutions/m2-economie-et-evaluation-du-developpement-et-de-la-soutenabilite), Université Paris-Saclay:

    -   Participation in the supervision of the evaluation of Malagasy diaspora projects within the [TADY](https://www.umi-source.uvsq.fr/projet-tady-tantsoroka-ho-anny-diaspora) project.

## Training Activities

-   **“T2VA” — Co-design of a training protocol.**\
    Development of a pedagogical framework integrating open science as a tool for *Travail, Valorisation, Vérification et Accompagnement* (PSF CREONS), including in-person modules, videos and written materials.\
    Resources: <https://umisource.github.io/psf_creons/modules.html>

-   **“Outils fondamentaux de la science ouverte” — Course design (UFHB, Abidjan, 2024).**\
    Design and teaching of a training program for PhD students, researchers and research support staff (PGD, institutional deposit, data papers and research data management best practices).\
    Resources: <https://amathieuln.github.io/SO_SOURCE/>\
    GitHub: <https://github.com/AMathieuLN/SO_SOURCE/tree/main>
